title: New free champion rotation: Tahm Kench, Bard, Quinn and more!

replies.body: the 2 troll champs of league, gj rito :P{{champion:432}} {{champion:223}}

The person that gives u the 'Best' {{item:3157}} 
The person that gives u death, (seriously, tahm can kill his own teammates)

Gj Riot, gj...
Here i come ranked, cant deal with this toxic-ness of tahm kench

Ranked? Just reminding you in case you forgot...if people don't own those champs, they can't play them in ranked :P
Unless you mean ranked 5's then yeah sure (even with the bans anyway)
Ik Tahm Kench and Bard arent allowed on Ranked (for me anyway cause i dont own them), I'm just saying, cause lesser people will use them because they're used mainly for trolls :P
Omfg, I bought {{champion:68}} last week, he was FTP. I buy {{champion:131}} 3 days ago, she is FTP. RITO PLEASE {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Time to destroy some nooby {{champion:122}} with {{champion:92}}

but I just bought{{champion:133}} so now people will be playing my new main! aw
{{champion:133}} {{item:3070}}

To be honest, I don't know if too many players will play Quinn even during the free week (I might end up being proved wrong). And the fact that you bought her and want to main her makes me pretty happy as I'm wanting to main her myself (I have been spamming her quite a bit if you look at my history :P). At least when free week is over you can pick her plenty. Brid lady OP :)
ya i get to kill my team mate with {{champion:432}} {{champion:223}}  :D
